casebody.data:
SEVENHILLS HEALTHCARE, LLC and Apollo Management Consultants, LLC
v.
ST. JAMES BEHAVIORAL HEALTH HOSPITAL INC., Lance E. Bullock, M.D., Rama Kongara, M.D. and Wendell B. Smith SevenHills Healthcare, LLC, Apollo Management Consultants, LLC and Gopinath Gopalam
v.
Wendell B. Smith NO. 2018-C-0704 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 14, 2018

Denied.
